title: Add hybrid authentication with admin credentials and comprehensive feature enhancements

requirements.text: Implement hybrid authentication system: After Internet Identity login, prompt users to enter admin credentials (username: 'rajan', password: 'Admin@123'). Only users who provide correct credentials gain admin access to create and manage parties/events. Store admin session state in React context.

quotes: ok complete remove internet identity, only make admin='rajan' and password='Admin@123'
Anyone who logs in with these credentials gets admin access

acceptanceCriteria: After Internet Identity login, user sees admin credential prompt
Correct credentials (rajan/Admin@123) grant admin access
Incorrect credentials deny admin privileges but allow basic viewing
Admin status persists during session
Backend validates admin status for protected operations

requirements.text: Add comprehensive search functionality for both parties and events that searches across party names, event names, and event descriptions. Include a search input field with real-time filtering that updates results as the user types.

quotes: Add search and filtering for parties/events?

acceptanceCriteria: Search input field appears on parties and events pages
Search works across party names, event names, and event descriptions
Results update in real-time as user types
Search is case-insensitive
Clear search button resets results

requirements.text: Implement filtering system for parties and events with filters for: date range (for events), associated party (for events), and any other relevant criteria. Display active filters as removable chips and provide a clear all filters option.

quotes: Add search and filtering for parties/events?

acceptanceCriteria: Filter panel displays available filter options
Date range filter for events
Party association filter for events
Active filters shown as removable chips
Clear all filters button resets to unfiltered view
Filters combine with search functionality

requirements.text: Create event categories and tags system with predefined categories (Birthday, Wedding, Corporate, Social, Charity, Other) that admins can assign to events. Support multiple categories per event and display category badges on event cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores event categories in event data model
Predefined categories: Birthday, Wedding, Corporate, Social, Charity, Other
Events can have multiple categories
Category selector in event creation/edit forms
Category badges displayed on event cards
Filter events by category

requirements.text: Build in-app notification center that displays notifications for: upcoming events (24 hours before), new events added, and event updates/changes. Notifications appear when users are logged in and persist until dismissed. Include notification badge count in navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: Notification center icon in navigation with unread count badge
Notifications for events happening within 24 hours
Notifications for newly created events
Notifications for event updates
Click notification to view event details
Dismiss individual notifications or clear all
Notifications persist across sessions until dismissed

requirements.text: Create reporting and analytics dashboard with metrics including: total parties count, total events count, events by category breakdown, upcoming events timeline, and party engagement statistics. Display data using charts (bar, pie, line) and summary cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Dedicated Reports/Analytics page in navigation
Summary cards showing total parties, total events, upcoming events count
Pie chart showing events by category distribution
Timeline chart showing events over time
Bar chart showing party engagement metrics
Date range selector for reports
Export report data button

requirements.text: Implement export functionality to generate CSV files containing party data (name, contact, events) and event data (name, date, description, categories, party). Include export to PDF functionality for reports with formatted tables and charts.
acceptanceCriteria: Export buttons on parties and events pages
CSV export includes all relevant party/event data
CSV files download with descriptive filenames including timestamp
PDF export for reports with formatted layout
PDF includes charts and summary statistics
Export respects current filters/search if active

requirements.text: Fix the Party ID generation authorization error by ensuring the new hybrid authentication system properly authorizes users with valid admin credentials to generate party IDs and perform all admin operations.

quotes: Unauthorized: Only users can generate party IDs

acceptanceCriteria: Users with admin credentials can generate party IDs without errors
Backend validates admin session for party creation
Clear error messages if admin credentials not provided
No authorization errors for authenticated admin users

constraints: Must maintain Internet Identity as the primary login mechanism per Internet Computer requirements
Cannot implement real-time push notifications, SMS, or email - only in-app notifications
PDF generation must use client-side libraries compatible with React
Backend must remain single-actor architecture in Motoko
Admin password must be stored securely in backend, not hardcoded in frontend
nonGoals: Replacing Internet Identity entirely with username/password
Multi-tenant architecture with separate admin accounts
Social media integrations or third-party APIs
